translation: This is called vajra food, which rules over all that can be destroyed, the bodhisattva's transformation-body heaven, and the results of right action. Recite these 1,800 recitations and take them in as is appropriate. Among the 3,000 worlds, the highest of the three kinds of beings can be brought into existence if you uphold men and women, which can cause Avesha. If you recite a single lakṣa, it can cause the gods of the three realms to know all the troubles and troubles of the fortunate and unfortunate events that arise. If you want to eat things that touch, first recite the instructions seven times, then you can eat things that touch, which make them all pure. If you recite the instructions three or seven times, then you toss your seal and add it to the container, which then becomes a tiller, which feeds on the poison of dragons.
